articles.description: Today, exactly 70 years ago, the Queen and Prince Philip embarked on a royal tour in place of her father George VI and were waved off from London Airport - and it turned out to be a highly significant moment
articles.content:
Later this year, a bumper bank holiday weekend of celebrations will pay tribute to the Queen's incredible 70-year reign.

articles.title: Owner of house with 25ft SHARK sticking out of its roof is fighting plans to give it listed status - Daily Mail
articles.description: Magnus Hanson-Heine, 34, who inherited the Headington Shark in Oxford, has reignited his late father's battle with Oxford City Council.
articles.content:
The owner of the house with a 25ft shark sticking out of its roof is fighting council plans to give it listed status because it was installed by his father as a protest against planning laws.
